name: part_009
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕LIVE2023】3rd Generation Girls Band !!!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [AqEqeiqskEI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song '小さな恋のうた' (Chisana Koi no Uta) by the 3rd Generation Girls Band.
MC section where Houshou Marine unexpectedly announces the band's disbandment and leaves the stage.
In a studio setting, the other members watch a special news announcement on TV featuring a new MV by Houshou Marine.
Live performance of the new song '美少女無罪♡パイレーツ' (Bishoujo Muzai Pirates) by Houshou Marine.
scenes.song_name: 美少女無罪♡パイレーツ

subtitles.english: Let the love song ring out

subtitles.original: 握りしめた手　離すことなく
subtitles.english: Holding hands tightly, never letting go

subtitles.original: 思いは強く　永遠誓う
subtitles.english: Our thoughts are strong, we swear eternity

subtitles.original: 永遠の淵　きっと僕は言う
subtitles.english: On the brink of eternity, I'm sure I'll say

subtitles.original: 思い変わらず　同じ言葉を
subtitles.english: The same words, my feelings unchanged

subtitles.original: それでも足りず　涙に変わり
subtitles.english: Even then it's not enough, they turn into tears

subtitles.original: 喜びになり　言葉にできず
subtitles.english: They turn into joy, I can't find the words

subtitles.english: I just hold you close

subtitles.english: The person most important to you is right by your side

subtitles.original: （歌唱）
subtitles.english: (Vocalizing)

subtitles.original: 響け恋の歌
subtitles.english: Let the love song ring out

subtitles.original: みんなー！ありがとうー！ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: ここで、一つ、
subtitles.english: Here, one thing,

subtitles.original: マリンからお知らせがあります。
subtitles.english: I have an announcement to make.

subtitles.original: え？何か聞いてる？　何？聞いてない。
subtitles.english: Eh? Did you hear anything? What? I haven't heard anything.

subtitles.original: 今日でこのバンドは、
subtitles.english: As of today, this band...

subtitles.original: 解散します！
subtitles.english: ...is disbanding!

subtitles.original: えーーー！？待って！待って！
subtitles.english: Eeeee!? Wait! Wait!

subtitles.original: 嘘でしょ…？
subtitles.english: You're kidding, right...?

subtitles.original: マリンには、やりたいことがあるんだ。
subtitles.english: I have something I want to do.

subtitles.original: やりたいこと？やりたいことって何…？
subtitles.english: Something you want to do? What do you mean by that...?

subtitles.original: みんな、さよなら。
subtitles.english: Everyone, goodbye.

subtitles.original: え？待って！行かないで！
subtitles.english: Eh? Wait! Don't go!

subtitles.original: 嘘ぺこでしょ…
subtitles.english: It's a prank, right-peko...

subtitles.original: うわー、マリンどうしてるかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder how Marine is doing.

subtitles.original: ねー。どっか行っちゃったよね。
subtitles.english: Yeah. She just left.

subtitles.original: あ、見て見て。
subtitles.english: Oh, look, look.

subtitles.original: 特報
subtitles.english: Special News

subtitles.original: 特別ですよ！
subtitles.english: This is special!

subtitles.original: アタシ厄介よ
subtitles.english: I'm troublesome

subtitles.original: 港なんかじゃ　はしゃがないわ
subtitles.english: I don't frolic at ports or anything

subtitles.original: 近頃まで　脱がされたの
subtitles.english: Until recently, I was stripped

subtitles.original: 真面目にして欲しい気分
subtitles.english: I'm in the mood to be serious

subtitles.original: ギュッと合わせて美少女無罪
subtitles.english: Press them together, beautiful girl is innocent

subtitles.original: キミのイチバン目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming to be your number one

subtitles.original: 夜空　本当は　自信ないけど
subtitles.english: The night sky, truth be told, I have no confidence but...

subtitles.original: 頑張っちゃう！
subtitles.english: ...I'll do my best!

subtitles.original: このあと22時プレミア公開！！
subtitles.english: Premiere at 22:00 after this!!

subtitles.original: ドキドキしてる？
subtitles.english: Is your heart pounding?

subtitles.original: いきますよー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 美少女無罪♡パイレーツ
subtitles.english: Beautiful Girl is Innocent ♡ Pirates

subtitles.original: (美少女無罪！美少女無罪！マリン！マリン！マリンは無罪！)
subtitles.english: (Beautiful girl is innocent! Beautiful girl is innocent! Marine! Marine! Marine is innocent!)

subtitles.original: やだキラキラ
subtitles.english: No, it's sparkling

subtitles.original: またクラクラ
subtitles.english: And dizzy again

subtitles.original: ねぇ、言ったよね？ねぇ、年齢なんて関係ないってさ。
subtitles.english: Hey, you said it, right? Hey, that age doesn't matter.

subtitles.original: そういうめんどくさいのも含めて愛してくれるって。
subtitles.english: That you'd love me including those troublesome parts.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、ねぇ、言ったよね？言ってない？
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, you said it, right? You didn't?

subtitles.original: ふん、そういうこと言うんだ。ちなみにこの船では美少女無罪が適用されますけど？
subtitles.english: Hmph, so you say that. By the way, "Beautiful Girl is Innocent" applies on this ship, you know?

subtitles.original: 任せて
subtitles.english: Leave it to me

subtitles.original: 魔法で若返り
subtitles.english: Rejuvenating with magic

subtitles.original: (若返り！若返り！)
subtitles.english: (Rejuvenation! Rejuvenation!)
